full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Portable NO2 H2O Trace Gas Analyzer**

**Title**: KW405-240362 - Portable NO2 H2O Trace Gas Analyzer 
**Reference Number**: WS4172884070-Doc4172962704

**Notice Type: Request for Proposal**

**Deadline for Submission**: **2023-09-26, 14:00 EDT**

**Objective**
The Climate Chemistry Measurement and Research section of Environment and Climate Change Canada requires a portable, robust, and stable measurement instrument that can detect trace emissions of N2O (Dinitrogen Oxide) and water vapour (H2O) from mobile surveys of atmospheric greenhouse gasses.

**Eligibility Criteria**
To be considered, bidders must clearly demonstrate compliance with each mandatory technical criteria. Any failure to demonstrate compliance will result in the offer being deemed non-responsive and will not be considered further.

**Selection Criteria**
The lowest price will be the selection criterion for this tender.

**Contact Information**
For any queries or clarifications related to this tender, please contact:
Christopher Harvey, PSPC
Email: christopher.harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Phone: (519) 671-2396

**Notice URL** 
For more information and to access the tender document, please visit:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17335149?extsite=MTczMzUxNDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Listing Classification**
*Elements and gases
*Nitrogen N
*Gas detectors
*Toxic gas detection services

**Region of Delivery**
Ontario (except NCR)

**Supply Agency**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

**Delivery Start Date** 
Estimated: 2023-10-16 (Pending selection of successful bidder)

**Rozia** : 
Trade Agreements: 
NAFTA, CFTA

Note: All bidders must carefully review the notice and submit their queries and concerns in a timely manner. Failure to comply with the terms and conditions may result in non-responsiveness. It is the bidder's responsibility to submit their offer on time and in the format specified in the tender package.
